resources.string: Umsindo uzaqaliswa emizuzwini engu-15, sicela umise noma yikuphi ukudlalwa kwevidiyo noma umsindo ngaphambi kwaleso sikhathi
Isihloko se-Cert Esingenamandla. Asidingeki uma i-CN ye-cert ihambisana negama lomsingathi
Ngenisa indlela ephelele kuya ku-CA yakho bese uchofoza Ngenisa
Ifayela alitholakalanga. Sicela ufake igama lefayela elivumelekile enkundleni yombhalo (isib. /sdcard/ca.crt).
Iphutha lokufunda ifayela le-CA. Sicela uqiniseke ukuthi liyafundeka.
Ukuqinisekisa kuhlulekile. Sicela ufake kabusha iziqinisekiso zakho.

Ingabe uyasamukela lesi sitifiketi somsingathi esisha noma esishintshiwe?

Izigxivizo Zeminwe:
MD5: %1$s
SHA1: %2$s
SHA256: %3$s

Ikhishwe kuya ku: %4$s
Ikhishwe ngu: %5$s

Kusukela ku: %6$s
Kuya ku: %7$s
Kuhlulekile ukulanda ifayela nge-HTTP. Mhlawumbe iseva yakho ayifinyeleleki.
Kuhlulekile ukulanda ifayela nge-HTTPS. Mhlawumbe isitifiketi seseva yakho asithembekile (siphelelwe yisikhathi noma siziqinisekisile) noma iseva yakho ayifinyeleleki.
Kuhlulekile ukuthola ifayela. Sicela ulilande futhi kodwa kulokhu, ulivule ngokushesha ukusuka kufolda Yokulanda ku-File Manager.
Kuhlulekile ukuthola ifayela. Sicela ulilande futhi, kodwa kulokhu, uzame ukulivula ukusuka endaweni Yezaziso noma ngqo kusuka ku-Browser uma kungenzeka.
I-VM yakho itholakale icishiwe futhi iqalisiwe. Sicela uzame futhi emizuzwini embalwa. Uma uzama masinyane futhi uthola ukuhluleka koxhumano, zama futhi kamuva.
Azikho Imishini Ebonakalayo etholakalayo yomsebenzisi onikeziwe.
Akukho Mishini Ebonakalayo ene-ID enikeziwe etholakele yomsebenzisi onikeziwe. Sula i-ID ukuthola uhlu lwe-VM.
Uhlobo lokubonisa lwe-VNC alusekelwa okwamanje, kodwa lusizinda oluzayo. Siyabonga ngokuqonda kwakho!
Kubonakala sengathi awuxhunyiwe ku-Inthanethi. Awukwazi ukuqhubeka ngaphandle kokuxhumeka!

Uxhumano ku-VM yakho luphelelwe yisikhathi. Sicela uhlole ukuthi ikheli lenodi esebenzisa i-VM yakho ilungile, ukuthi iyafinyeleleka kunethiwekhi yakho yamanje, nokuthi akukho firewall evimba uxhumano.
Ukuqinisekisa kuhlulekile. Sicela uhlole umsebenzisi nephasiwedi enikeziwe.
Ukuxhawulana kwe-SSL kuhlulekile. Kunenkinga ngesitifiketi se-SSL seseva. Uma usebenzisa isitifiketi esiziqinisekisile, udinga ukuthi u(phinde u)ngenise isikhulu sesitifiketi sakho.
Kuhlulekile ukuqinisekisa ku-Proxmox Virtual Environment. Sicela uqiniseke ukuthi ufaka igama lakho lomsebenzisi ngefomethi ye-user@realm nokuthi iphasiwedi yakho ilungile.
Kuhlulekile ukuhlaziya impendulo evela ku-Proxmox Virtual Environment.
I-VM ID akuyona inombolo. Sicela ufake i-VM ID enezinombolo noma uyishiye ingenalutho ukukhetha i-VM ohlwini.
Impendulo engalindelekile evela ku-Proxmox Virtual Environment:
I-Proxmox Virtual Environment ibuyise idatha engenalutho.
Isikhathi sokuqeda sokuxhumana ne-Proxmox Virtual Environment.
Ayikwazanga ukuthola umshini obonakalayo onegama elibekiwe olunikezwe umsebenzisi wakho. Sicela usule igama le-VM elibekiwe ukuze ubone uhlu lwe-VM ezabelwe umsebenzisi.
Sicela ufake bVNC evela ku-Google Play ukuze uxhume ku-VNC console yalokhu ku-VM.
Dinga igama elifanayo ukuze lifane nesitifiketi (kuphakanyiswa)

Inguqulo ye-Pro futhi inesekelo lokuqinisekisa kwe-SSH okuningi. Ngaphezu kwalokho, isekela isici se-Master Password esiceliwe kakhulu esivimba ukusebenza okungagunyaziwe futhi ibethela zonke izilungiselelo zoxhumano kufaka phakathi amaphasiwedi nezikhiye ze-SSH ukuvikela ekubiwen. Yivule ku-Menu eyinhloko.
Chofoza lapha ukuthenga Opaque futhi ulondoloze uxhumano oluqondile ku-Proxmox ne-oVirt. Futhi isekela amafayela e-.vv.
Chofoza lapha ukuthenga inguqulo ye-Pro futhi uvule amafayela e-.vv kuphela.
Chofoza lapha ukusekela iphrojekthi ngomnikelo omncane ngokuthenga inguqulo ye-Pro.
Inguqulo ye-Pro ikuvumela ukuthi ukhubaze le ngxoxo futhi ikunikeze ukufinyelela ezicini ezengeziwe.
Uma ungathanda ukusekela iphrojekthi ngokuningi, landela izixhumanisi ezilandelayo zamaxhumaniso ezihlelo zokusebenza zamakhasimende zika-:
Iphrojekthi ye-Open Source idinga ukusekelwa kwakho! Nikela kithi ngokuthenga bVNC Pro. Bona ngezansi amaxhumaniso aya ku-bVNC Pro nezinye izinhlelo zokusebenza zethu.

Iphrojekthi ye-Open Source idinga ukusekelwa kwakho! Nikela kithi ngokuthenga aRDP Pro, esekela ukuqondisa kabusha komsindo. Bona ngezansi amaxhumaniso aya ku-aRDP Pro nezinye izinhlelo zokusebenza zethu.

Ngoxhumano lwe-Proxmox ne-oVirt, sicela unikele kuphrojekthi ngokuthenga Opaque noma aSPICE Pro. Inguqulo yamahhala ye-aSPICE isekela kuphela uxhumano oluqondile kumaShini Ebonakalayo e-KVM. Bona ngezansi amaxhumaniso aya ku-Opaque ne-aSPICE Pro, kanye nezinye izinhlelo zokusebenza zethu.

Uhlelo zokusebenza lungathola ngokuzenzakalelayo ama-session e-X akhona futhi lwakhe amasha kumasistemu e-Linux/UNIX (efana ne-NX). Udinga i-x11vnc ukuthola, ne-Xvfb, i-Xvnc, noma i-Xdummy ukwakha ama-session. Uma unenkinga yokuxhuma, zama ukukhetha Uhlobo Oluthize Lwe-Session Ekude Ezilungiselelweni Ezithuthukile ze-AutoX.
Qinisekisa usebenzisa Igama Lomsebenzisi/Iphasiwedi ye-SSH enikeziwe ngokuzenzakalelayo (esikrinini esimnyama sokungena).
Sebenzisa iziqinisekiso ze-UNIX esikhundleni sendlela yezokuphepha yangaphakathi. Umsebenzisi kumele akwazi ukusebenzisa /bin/su.
Ingabe ufuna ukuhlela noma ukususa uxhumano
Sebenzisa D-Pad yemicibisholo ne-D-Pad click ye-Ctrl.

Iseva ye-VNC izama ukusebenzisa ama-cipher e-Anonymous Diffie Hellman angasekelwa kudivayisi yakho ye-Android. Uma usebenzisa iseva ye-VNC ye-Vino ye-GNOME, ungakhubaza i-AnonTLS ngokusebenzisa lo myalo kutheminali bese uqala kabusha: \"gsettings set org.gnome.Vino require-encryption false\". Uma usebenzisa i-x11vnc, ungangeza lezi zinketho: \"-vencrypt nodh:only -ssl\".
Sicela ufake okungenani umsebenzisi negama lomsingathi noma ikheli le-IP.

Ayikwazi ukwaba inkumbulo eyanele yokudweba isikrini sakude. Zama ukuqala kabusha uhlelo zokusebenza, bese uqala kabusha idivayisi yakho. Ungaphinda uzame ukunciphisa usayizi wedeskithophu ekude ngezilungiselelo zohlelo zokusebenza.
Ayikwazi ukuxhuma noma ukuqinisekisa, sicela uhlole ikheli leseva, umsebenzisi, iphasiwedi, nesitifiketi sesikhulu kanye nesihloko.
Sicela uqiniseke ukuthi ukhethe into efanele ku-Uhlobo Loxhumano.
Ukuqinisekisa kwe-RDP kuhlulekile! Sicela uhlole igama lomsebenzisi le-RDP nephasiwedi bese uzama futhi.
Uxhumano lwe-RDP luhlulekile! Ukuxhumeka kwenethiwekhi kuphazamisekile, iseva ye-RDP icishiwe noma ikhutshaziwe, noma i-session yakho ithathwe.
Ayikwazanga ukuxhuma kuziseva ze-RDP! Sicela uqiniseke ukuthi isilungiselelo se-RDP Server silungile, iseva ivuliwe, i-RDP ivuliwe, nokuthi iseva ikuyo nethiwekhi efanayo naleli divayisi.
Ayikwazi ukuxhuma noma ukuqinisekisa, sicela uhlole ikheli leseva nembobo.
IPHUTHA! Ukhiye womsingathi weseva ushintshile. Uma lokhu kuneqolo, ungaqhubeka. Ngaphandle kwalokho, lokhu kungaba ukuhlasela kwe-man in the middle.

Iseva ye-SSH ayisekeli izindlela zokuqinisekisa ze-\"password\" noma ze-\"keyboard-interactive\" noma idinga indlela ye-\"publickey\" kuqala. Sicela uyilungise ukuthi ivumele okungenani enye yezindlela ezimbili, noma ulungise kabusha uhlelo zokusebenza. Izindlela zokuqinisekisa ezitholakalayo:

Kuhlulekile ukuqinisekisa kuseva ye-SSH ngepheya lokhiye. Sicela uhlole igama lakho lomsebenzisi le-SSH, futhi uqiniseke ukuthi ukhiye wakho womphakathi usefayeleni le-authorized_keys ohlangothini olukude.
Kuhlulekile ukuvula ipheya lokhiye. Sicela uqiniseke ukuthi ufake ibinzana lakho lephasiwedi ngendlela efanele enkundleni ye-\'SSH Passphrase\' esikrinini esiyinhloko.
Ipheya lokhiye le-SSH alikakhiqizwa okwamanje! Sicela ulikhiqize futhi ulibeke (ingxenye yomphakathi) ku-authorized_keys kuseva ye-SSH.
Ibinzana lephasiwedi linikeziwe kodwa ipheya lokhiye alibekhelwe. Sicela ususe ibinzana lephasiwedi.
Ayikwazanga ukulungiselela ukudluliswa kwembobo yokudonsa ithrafikhi ye-VNC nge-SSH. Sicela uqiniseke ukuthi iseva yakho ye-SSH ilungiselelwe ukuthi ivumele ukudluliswa kwembobo bese uzama futhi.

Iseva ye-SSH ayisekeli indlela yokuqinisekisa ye-\"publickey\", futhi sizama ukusebenzisa ipheya lokhiye ukuqinisekisa. Sicela uyilungise ukuthi ivumele ukuqinisekisa kokhiye womphakathi bese uzama futhi. Izindlela zokuqinisekisa ezitholakalayo:
Kuhlulekile ukuqinisekisa kuseva ye-SSH ngephasiwedi. Sicela uhlole igama lakho lomsebenzisi le-SSH, nephasiwedi ye-SSH.
Kuhlulekile ukuxhuma kuziseva ze-SSH. Sicela uhlole ukuxhumeka kwenethiwekhi, nekheli le-Seva ye-SSH nembobo.
Ayikwazanga ukuthola imbobo ye-VNC ekude esuka ku-x11vnc. Sicela uqiniseke ukuthi i-x11vnc ifakiwe. Ukuqiniseka, zama ukusebenzisa i-x11vnc ngesandla emgqeni womyalo.
Ayikwazi ukuhlaziya i-Intent URI. Sicela uhlole ifomethi ye-URI. Ungaphinda ubone i-logcat yedivayisi ukuthola imininingwane engeziwe.
Ukuqinisekisa kwe-VNC kuhlulekile! Hlola iphasiwedi ye-VNC (nomsebenzisi uma kufanele).
Akukwazanga ukukhiqizwa isiginesha ye-SHA1 noma ye-MD5 yesitifiketi. Ayikho i-algorithm ye-SHA1/MD5 etholiwe.
\n\nUngaqiniseka ukuthi ulwazi lufana nesitifiketi seseva ukuvikela ukuhlasela kwe-man-in-the-middle.

Ingabe ufuna ukuxhuma kumsingathi ohlonzwa yilesi sitifiketi esilandelayo?

Isigxivizo Seminwe: %1$s

Ikhishwe kuya ku:
%2$s

Ikhishwe ngu:
%3$s

Kusukela ku:
%4$s

Kuya ku:
%5$s

Qaphela: Uhlelo zokusebenza aluqinisekisi izikhulu zezitifiketi noma luhlole ukuhoxiswa kwezitifiketi.
\n\nUngaqiniseka ukuthi sifana nesigxivizo seminwe esaziwayo sesitifiketi seseva ukuvikela ukuhlasela kwe-man-in-the-middle.

Ngqo, Bamba Ukupana: Swayipha ukudonsela futhi uphonse. Chofoza ngomunwe owodwa lapho ufuna ukukhilikitha ngakwesokunxele, iminwe emibili ukukhilikitha ngakwesokudla, neminwe emithathu ukukhilikitha phakathi. Swayipha ngeminwe emibili ukuskrola. Chofoza isikhathi eside ukuqala ukupana.

Ngqo, Swayipha Ukupana: Swayipha ukupana. Chofoza ngomunwe owodwa lapho ufuna ukukhilikitha ngakwesokunxele, iminwe emibili ukukhilikitha ngakwesokudla, neminwe emithathu ukukhilikitha phakathi. Swayipha ngeminwe emibili ukuskrola. Chofoza isikhathi eside ukudonsela futhi uphonse.

Ngesandla Esisodwa: Swayipha ukupana. Chofoza ngomunwe owodwa lapho ufuna ukukhilikitha ngakwesokunxele. Chofoza isikhathi eside ukukhetha imodi yokudonsela kwesokunxele/kwesokudla/phakathi/ukuskrola/ukusondeza. Izilawuli zokuthinta ezijwayelekile nazo ziyasebenza.

I-Touchpad Efaniswe: Swayipha ukuhambisa isikhombisi. Chofoza noma kuphi ngomunwe owodwa ukukhilikitha ngakwesokunxele, iminwe emibili ukukhilikitha ngakwesokudla, neminwe emithathu ukukhilikitha phakathi. Swayipha ngeminwe emibili ukuskrola. Chofoza isikhathi eside ukudonsela futhi uphonse.

" Kunoma iyiphi Imodi Yokufaka, chofoza isithonjana sekhibhodi ukuthola ikhibhodi yesikrini. Futhi, idivayisi yakho ingase ibe nesenzo sayo esiletha ikhibhodi.
Sebenzisa izimodi zokufaka Ngqo ukulawula isikrini sokuthinta ngokuqondile. Sebenzisa Imodi ye-Touchpad Efaniswe ukulawula ngcono igundane.
Imodi Yokupana Ngokuswayipha Ngqo: - Lawula igundane ngqo ngokuthinta. - Swayipha ukupana. - Ukuchofoza kwenza igundane likhilikithe lapho uchofoza khona. - Izehlakalo zokuskrola zithunyelwa phakathi kweminwe emibili lapho ukuswayipha ngeminwe emibili kuqale khona.
Imodi Yokupana Ngokubamba Ngqo: - Lawula igundane ngqo ngokuthinta. - Chofoza isikhathi eside ukuqala imodi yokupana. - Ukuchofoza kwenza igundane likhilikithe lapho uchofoza khona. - Izehlakalo zokuskrola zithunyelwa phakathi kweminwe emibili lapho ukuswayipha ngeminwe emibili kuqale khona.
Imodi ye-Touchpad Efaniswe: - Sebenzisa isikrini sakho njengetouchpad. - Swayipha ukuhambisa isikhombisi segundane. - Hambisa igundane ngale komngcele wesikrini ukupana. - Ukuchofoza kwenza igundane likhilikithe lapho isikhombisi sikhona. - Izehlakalo zokuskrola zithunyelwa lapho isikhombisi segundane sikhona.
Imodi Ngesandla Esisodwa: - Efana Nemodi Yokupana Ngokuswayipha Ngqo, ngaphandle kokuthi ukuchofoza isikhathi eside kuvula imenyu enokuzikhethela kwezimodi. - Ngemuva kokuzikhethela imodi, ukuswayipha umnwe esikrinini kwenza isenzo esikhethiwe. - Ukuphakamisa umnwe kuqedela isenzo.
Zonke Izimodi Zokufaka: - Khilikitha kwesokunxele: Chofoza kanye. - Khilikitha kabili: Chofoza kabili. - Khilikitha kwesokudla: Chofoza-bamba bese uchofoza ngomunwe wesibili (noma kuphi kwenye indawo esikrinini). - Enye Ukukhilikitha Kwesokudla: Sebenzisa inkinobho ethi \"Emuva\" noma isenzo sedivayisi yakho. - Khilikitha Phakathi: Chofoza-bamba bese uchofoza ngeminwe emibili engaphezu (noma kuphi kwenye indawo esikrinini). - Ukudonsela Kwegundane: Chofoza-bamba-isikhathi-eside bese uswayipha. - Isondo Lokuskrola: Donsa ngeminwe emibili phezulu/phansi nangakwesokunxele/kwesokudla. Ukudonsa ngokushesha kuskrola ngokushesha. - Sondeza/Susa: Ku-scaling Yokusondeza, nciphiza-sondeza ukulawula uskaling. - Ukhiye we-Ctrl/Alt: Imenyu->Izinkinobho ze-Ctrl/Alt. Ungakhohlwa ukuvala uma uqedile! - Izinhlanganisela zokhiye: Imenyu->Okuningi->Thumela Okhiye. - Thumela umbhalo: Thayipha kwikhibhodi yesikrini, noma usebenzise Imenyu->Okuningi->Thumela Umbhalo."

Uhlu lwamanje lwezici ze-bVNC:
- VNC Evamile, VNC Ephephile nge-SSH, AnonTLS, ne-VeNCrypt, ne-UltraVNC Windows Logon ngokukhethwa kwe-Repeater.
- Imodi ye-AutoX: Kwimodi ye-VNC nge-SSH, thola ngokuzenzakalelayo ama-session e-X akhona futhi/noma wakhe amasha usebenzisa i-x11vnc! Isebenza njengeqalabulzo le-NX.
- Ukusekelwa kokuphendula ngokukhululeka. Sebenzisa Uhlelo Lokusebenza ukunciphisa ukuphendula uma kudingeka.
- Ukukhiqizwa nokuthunywa kokhiye womphakathi/wangasese we-SSH.
- Zonke izindlela ezijwayelekile zokubethela ze-VNC, kufaka phakathi i-Tight, i-ZRLE, ne-CopyRect.
- Ukulondolozwa Kwe-Session Okuzenzakalelayo.
- Izimodi zokuskala Ezisondezekayo, Lingana Nesikrini, ne-Eyodwa Ku-Eyodwa.
- Ukulawulwa kwegundane elekude ngokuthinta okuningi kwizimodi zokufaka Ngqo ne-Touchpad Efaniswe.
- Ukulawulwa okuphelele kwegundane elekude ngesandla esisodwa kwimodi yokufaka Ngesandla Esisodwa.
- Ukukhilikitha kwegundane ngokuthinta okuningi: chofoza ukukhilikitha Kwesokunxele, ukuchofoza ngeminwe emibili ukukhilikitha kwesokudla, ukuchofoza ngeminwe emithathu ukukhilikitha phakathi.
- Ukuskrola ngokuthinta okuningi: ukudonsa ngeminwe emibili Phezulu/Phansi, nangakwesokunxele/kwesokudla ukuskrola.
- Okhiye be-meta nemicibisholo yesikrini abangakhutshazwa ngokuphelele kumenyu noma bagcinwe ngenkinobho yesikrini.
- Ukuthumela Umbhalo nezinhlanganisela zokhiye ezingavumelekile lapho kuxhunyiwe.
- Usizo lokwakha uxhumano (\"Imenyu->Usizo Loxhumano\") esikrinini soxhumano.
- Usizo lwezimodi zokufaka (\"Imenyu->Okuningi->Usizo Lwemodi Yokufaka\") lapho kuxhunyiwe.
- Ukusebenzisa i-trackpad etholakalayo njengeMicibisholo esikhundleni sokuhambisa igundane, nokuchofoza kwetrekhphedi njenge-Ctrl.
- Ukushintshela kwimodi ye-portrait ngesikhathi soxhumano, ukuphendula i-D-Pad/i-trackpad yamakhibhodi e-BT.
- Ukusekelwa kwezilimi eziningi, uma nje iseva ye-VNC inendlela yolimi edingekayo evuliwe.
- Ukuhlanganiswa Kwekopishi/Kunamathisele
- Ukushintshwa kosandiso lwedeskithophu ekude
- Ukusekelwa okuphelele kwegundane kumadivayisi e-Android 4.0+, kufaka phakathi ukukhilikitha kwesokudla nokuphakathi nesondo lokuskrola.

Izinkinga ezaziwayo:
Isikhombisi segundane sendawo (khetha uma isikhombisi singabonakali)

" Uma ungeza noma uhlela uxhumano, uzobona ikhasi lokulungiselelwa koxhumano. Lapha ungalungiselela uxhumano olusha lwe-VNC, noma ukhethe oluvele lukhona. Phezulu kukhona inkinobho ekuvumela ukuthi ulondoloze uxhumano. Ngezansi kungalapho ulungisa khona uxhumano lwakho.
Uma ufuna ukukhuphulwa kwamandla okushesha, zama ukusetha Imodi Yombala kulinganiso eliphansi. Futhi, zama ukususa isithombe sangemuva sedeskithophu kuseva ye-VNC. Ekugcineni, qiniseka ukuthi idivayisi yakho inokuxhumeka kwenethiwekhi okuhle futhi ugweme ukumboza i-antenna yayo ukunciphisa amandla wesignali.
- Uhlobo Loxhumano: Lapha ukhetha uhlobo loxhumano lwe-VNC. Izinhlobo zoxhumano ezitholakalayo yilezi: (a) VNC Evamile, esekelwa yizo zonke iziseva ze-VNC kodwa ayinayo ukubethela futhi inobuthakathaka ekuhlaselweni kwe-brute-force ngenxa yokuvinjelwa kwephasiwedi engabalingani abangu-8. (b) VNC Ephephile nge-SSH, exhuma ngethunneli ebethelwe ye-SSH. Udinga isevisi ye-SSHD esebenzayo kanye neseva ye-VNC. Uma nje iseva ye-VNC ingamukeli uxhumano ngqo ku-Inthanethi, lolu hlobo loxhumano alunabo ubuthakathaka obaziwa, uma nje uqinisekisa isiginesha sesitifiketi seseva uma uxhuma okokuqala. (c) UltraVNC, ekunikeza izinketho ze-Windows Logon ne-UltraVNC Repeater. Ukusebenzisa i-Windows Logon akuhlupheki ngokuvinjelwa kwephasiwedi engabalingani abangu-8, kodwa le modi ayinikezi ukubethela, ngakho i-session yakho inobuthakathaka ekuhogeni. (d) VNC Ephephile nge-AnonTLS, eyona i-VNC evamile phezu koxhumano olulingana ne-stunnel. Udinga ukusebenzisa i-stunnel, noma usebenzise iseva ye-VNC efana ne-Vino esekela i-AnonTLS ngaphandle kwesidingo. Le modi ikunikeza ukubethela kwe-session, kodwa ihlupheka ngokuvinjelwa kwephasiwedi engabalingani abangu-8 futhi ayivikeli ukuhlasela kwe-man-in-the-middle. (e) VNC Ephephile nge-VeNCrypt, esebenzisa izitifiketi ze-x509 kanye nokubethela kwe-session, futhi ngokuya ngokulungiselela kweseva ingasebenzisa iziqinisekiso zomsebenzisi/iphasiwedi ngaphandle kokuvinjelwa kwabalingani abangu-8. Le modi ivikela ukuhlasela kwe-man-in-the-middle kanye nokunikeza ubumfihlo be-session. Iziseva ezifana ne-x11vnc ne-TigerVNC zisekela le modi futhi ziphephe njenge-VNC nge-SSH.
- Isihloko: Uxhumano ngalunye olwakhayo lungaba nesiteketiso sokulubona kalula ohlwini.
- Izilungiselelo Zethunneli ye-SSH: Zitholakala kwimodi ye-VNC nge-SSH. (a) Iseva ye-SSH/Imbobo: Ikheli nembobo yeseva ye-SSH uxhumano oluzodluliswa kuyo. Ngokuvamile i-SSH ilalela kumbhobo 22. (b) Igama Lomsebenzisi/Iphasiwedi: Igama lomsebenzisi nephasiwedi ye-akhawunti kuseva ye-SSH. Iphasiwedi izogcwaliswa kuleli khasi uma ungakayeki uhlelo zokusebenza kusukela ekugcineni uyifakile. (c) Phatha Ukhiye/Sebenzisa Ukhiye: Inkinobho yokuphatha okhiye bomphakathi/bangasese, nebhokisi lokuhlola elibonisa ukuthi kusebenziswe ukhiye kunokusetshenziswa kwephasiwedi ukuqinisekisa. Uma usebenzisa inkinobho yokukopishela ku-Clipboard ngemuva kokukhiqiza ipheya lokhiye, kumele ukwazi ukunamathisela ukhiye womphakathi uma usuxhunyiwe kuseva ye-VNC (i-clipboard ivumelaniswe neseva).
- Lungisa i-AutoX: Itholakala kuphela kwimodi ye-VNC nge-SSH. Uhlelo zokusebenza lungathola ngokuzenzakalelayo ama-session e-X akhona futhi ngokukhethwa lwakhe amasha kumasistemu e-UNIX (njengeqalabulzo le-NX). Udinga i-x11vnc ukuthola, ne-Xvfb, i-Xvnc, noma i-Xdummy efakwe kuzisitemu ezikude ukwakha ama-session. Kungase kudingeke ukuthi ususe ifayela lakho le-.dmrc futhi ungeze ifayela le-.xinit kumkhombandlela wakho wasekhaya uma ideskithophu yakho ingabukeki kahle noma uthola iwindi le-xterm kuphela.
- Izilungiselelo Zoxhumano Lwe-VNC: (a) Iseva ye-VNC/Imbobo: Yilapha lapho ufaka khona igama lomsingathi noma ikheli le-IP nembobo yekhompyutha esebenzisa iseva ye-VNC ofuna ukuyithinta. Kwimodi ye-VNC nge-SSH, leli kheli libonakala kusuka kuziseva ye-SSH. Uma iseva ye-SSH neseva ye-VNC kuyikhompyutha efanayo, ungasebenzisa localhost. Iziseva ze-VNC zivame ukulalela kusukela kumbhobo 5900 (isikrini sokuqala se-VNC, isikrini :0). (b) Umsebenzisi we-VNC: Itholakala kwimodi ye-UltraVNC ne-Windows Logon, noma ye-VNC Ephephile nge-VeNCrypt, yilapha lapho ufaka khona igama lakho lomsebenzisi le-Windows/UNIX. (c) Iphasiwedi ye-VNC: Uma ukulungiselela kweseva yakho ye-VNC kudinga iphasiwedi, faka leyo phasiwedi lapha. Kwizimodi ze-UltraVNC ne-Windows Logon/VeNCrypt, faka iphasiwedi ye-akhawunti yakho ye-Windows/UNIX lapha. Isitoreji esiphephile asisetshenziswa kumaphasiwedi, futhi iphasiwedi izolondolozwa kuphela uma uhlola ibhokisi elithi \"Gcina\". Iphasiwedi izogcwaliswa kuleli khasi uma ungakayeki uhlelo zokusebenza kusukela ekugcineni uyifakile.
- Imodi Yombala: Iqalabulzo lisekela izimodi eziningi zombala. Izimodi ezinombala omningi zinikeza umuzwa obukeka kangcono ngezindleko zebhandwidi elikhulu nokukhomputha okuningi kwe-CPU kudivayisi yakho. Ezinye iziseva ze-VNC azisekeli ukujula kombala konke (isib. i-OS/X Remote Desktop idinga umbala wama-24 bit). Uma unenkinga yokuxhuma, zama elinye ijula lombala.
- Sebenzisa D-Pad yemicibisholo: Uma ukhetha, ungasebenzisa i-D-Pad yekhibhodi yakho ye-Bluetooth noma imicibisholo yekhibhodi yakho yesikrini ukuthumela imicibisholo kuseva ye-VNC.
- Phendula D-Pad: Izingcingo eziphahlene nekhibhodi ye-Bluetooth zingase zidinge ukuthi i-D-pad yekhibhodi iphendulwe ngokuphambana newashi ukuthumela iziqondiso ezilungile kuseva.
- Isikhombisi segundane sendawo: Ezinye iziseva ze-VNC (isib. i-OS/X Remote Desktop) ngeke zidwebe isikhombisi segundane kuqalabulzo. Ukuhlola le nketho kuzobangela uhlelo zokusebenza ukuthi ludwebe isikhombisi segundane endaweni yegundane.
- Okuzenzakalelayo/I-Bitmap Yesikrini Esigcwele: Iqalabulzo le-VNC lisebenzisa i-bitmap ukumela ukubonisa okukude. Ngokubonisa okukude okukhulu kakhulu, ikakhulukazi kwimodi yokulinga nesikrini, ungase ubhekane nomqondo wezinto ezingavamile lapho kwimodi yokulinga nesikrini, ngenxa yokuvinjelwa kwenkumbulo yomsebenzi ngamunye. Uma lokho kwenzeka, zama ukuhlola le nketho. Qaphela ukuthi ukuhlola le nketho kungabangela uhlelo zokusebenza ukuthi luyeke ekuxhumeni.
- Repeater: Itholakala kuphela kwimodi ye-UltraVNC. OKUBALULEKILE: Uma une-UltraVNC repeater, faka ikheli layo nembobo ngaphandle kwengxoxo ye-\'UltraVNC Repeater\' futhi ufake ikheli nembobo yeseva ye-VNC yangempela ngaphakathi kwengxoxo ye-\'UltraVNC Repeater\'. Hlukanisa ikheli leseva ye-VNC nembobo ngokucolon, isib. 192.168.0.100:5900."
Ayikwazanga ukukhubaza iphasiwedi eyinhloko. Hlola isikhala esikhululekile kudivayisi yakho bese uzama futhi.
Ayikwazanga ukuvumela iphasiwedi eyinhloko. Hlola isikhala esikhululekile kudivayisi yakho bese uzama futhi.
Ama-Intent oxhumano awakasekelwa lapho Iphasiwedi Eyinhloko ivuliwe.
Izinqamuleli azikasekelwa lapho Iphasiwedi Eyinhloko ivuliwe.

Sicela ufake futhi ukhumbule Iphasiwedi Eyinhloko. Uma iphasiwedi yakho inde, kunzima ukuyiphula. Uma usetha iphasiwedi yakho kabi noma uyikhohlwa, uzokhumbula zonke izilungiselelo zakho! Ungase ufune ukuthumela izilungiselelo zakho manje ukuzigcina (kusuka kuMenyu). Zigcine ngokuphepha ngoba izilungiselelo ezithunyelwe azibethelwe.
Sicela ufake Iphasiwedi Eyinhloko elungile ukuze uqhubeke.
Vumela Ukuhlanganiswa Kwe-Clipboard Yendawo kuya Kokukude
Vumela Ukuhlanganiswa Kwe-Clipboard Ekude kuya Kwendawo

Kubonakala sengathi iseva yakho inokuqinisekisa okuningi okuvuliwe. Sicela usekele iphrojekthi ngokuthenga inguqulo ye-Pro enesekelo lalesi sici. Ixhumaniso lokuya inguqulweni ye-Pro litholakala engxoxweni yokuqala.

Kubonakala sengathi usebenzisa isici se-Pro. Sicela usekele iphrojekthi ngokuthenga inguqulo ye-Pro enesekelo lalesi sici. Sicela uhlole ingxoxo yesethulo ukuthola amaxhumaniso ohlelo zokusebenza olufanele.
Kubonakala sengathi usebenzisa isici se-Pro. Sicela usekele iphrojekthi ngokuthenga inguqulo ye-Pro enesekelo lalesi sici. Ixhumaniso lokuya inguqulweni ye-Pro litholakala engxoxweni yokuqala.

Kubonakala sengathi uzamile ukuvula ifayela le-.rdp okuyisici se-Pro. Sicela usekele iphrojekthi ngokuthenga aRDP Pro, esekela amafayela e-.rdp. Ixhumaniso lokuya inguqulweni ye-aRDP Pro litholakala engxoxweni yokuqala.

Kubonakala sengathi uzamile ukuvula ifayela le-.vv. Uma ungathanda ukulondoloza uxhumano ku-Proxmox noma ku-oVirt ngqo ngaphakathi kohlelo zokusebenza futhi ufune ukuvula amafayela e-.vv, cabanga ngokuthenga Opaque. Uma udinga ukusekelwa kwefayela le-.vv kuphela, ungathola aSPICE Pro. Thola amaxhumaniso azo zombili izinhlelo zokusebenza engxoxweni yokuqala.

Siyabonga ngokusekelwa kwe-aRDP kanye nesofthiwe ye-open-source ngokujwayelekile! Ukuthola usizo ngokusebenzisa i-aRDP, bona izinto Zosizo kuMenyu, nencazelo yohlelo zokusebenza emakethe.

Uhlu lwamanje lwezici ze-aRDP lufaka:
- RDP Evamile, RDP edluliswe ngethunneli ye-SSH.
- Ukusekelwa kokuphendula ngokukhululeka. Sebenzisa Uhlelo Lokusebenza ukunciphisa ukuphendula uma kudingeka.
- Ukusetha usandiso lwekude, usandiso lomdabu kwizimodi ze-landscape ne-portrait.
- Ukukhiqizwa nokuthunywa kokhiye womphakathi/wangasese we-SSH.
- Ukulondolozwa Kwe-Session Okuzenzakalelayo.
- Izimodi zokuskala Ezisondezekayo, Lingana Nesikrini, ne-Eyodwa Ku-Eyodwa.
- Ukulawulwa kwegundane elekude ngokuthinta okuningi kwizimodi zokufaka Ngqo ne-Touchpad Efaniswe.
- Ukulawulwa okuphelele kwegundane elekude ngesandla esisodwa kwimodi yokufaka Ngesandla Esisodwa.
- Ukukhilikitha kwegundane ngokuthinta okuningi: chofoza ukukhilikitha Kwesokunxele, ukuchofoza ngeminwe emibili ukukhilikitha kwesokudla, ukuchofoza ngeminwe emithathu ukukhilikitha phakathi.
- Ukuskrola ngokuthinta okuningi: ukudonsa ngeminwe emibili Phezulu/Phansi, nangakwesokunxele/kwesokudla ukuskrola.
- Okhiye be-meta nemicibisholo yesikrini abangakhutshazwa ngokuphelele kumenyu noma bagcinwe ngenkinobho yesikrini.
- Ukuthumela Umbhalo nezinhlanganisela zokhiye ezingavumelekile lapho kuxhunyiwe.
- Usizo lokwakha uxhumano (\"Imenyu->Usizo Loxhumano\") esikrinini soxhumano.
- Usizo lwezimodi zokufaka (\"Imenyu->Okuningi->Usizo Lwemodi Yokufaka\") lapho kuxhunyiwe.
- Ukusebenzisa i-trackpad etholakalayo njengeMicibisholo esikhundleni sokuhambisa igundane, nokuchofoza kwetrekhphedi njenge-Ctrl, ukuphendula i-D-Pad/i-trackpad yamakhibhodi e-BT.
- Ukusekelwa kwezilimi eziningi, uma nje iseva ye-RDP inendlela yolimi edingekayo evuliwe.
- Ukushintshwa kosandiso lwedeskithophu ekude ngaphandle kwenkinga
- Ukusekelwa okuphelele kwegundane kumadivayisi e-Android 4.0+, kufaka phakathi ukukhilikitha kwesokudla nokuphakathi nesondo lokuskrola.
- Ukukhetha kwezimodi zombala
- Ukuhlanganiswa Kwekopishi/Kunamathisele
- Ukuthumela izilungiselelo
- Umsindo

Izinkinga ezaziwayo:

" Uma ungeza noma uhlela uxhumano, uzobona ikhasi lokulungiselelwa koxhumano. Lapha ungalungiselela uxhumano olusha lwe-RDP, noma ukhethe oluvele lukhona. Phezulu kukhona inkinobho ekuvumela ukuthi ulondoloze uxhumano. Ngezansi kungalapho ulungisa khona uxhumano lwakho.
- Uhlobo Loxhumano: Lapha ukhetha uhlobo loxhumano lwe-RDP. Izinhlobo zoxhumano ezitholakalayo yilezi: (a) RDP, exhuma ngqo kukhompyutha nge-protocol ye-RDP. (b) RDP nge-SSH, eqala ngokudonsa uxhumano lwakho ngekhompyutha esebenzisa iseva ye-SSH.
- Isihloko: Uxhumano ngalunye olwakhayo lungaba nesiteketiso sokulubona kalula ohlwini.
- Izilungiselelo Zethunneli ye-SSH: Zitholakala kwimodi ye-RDP nge-SSH. (a) Iseva ye-SSH/Imbobo: Ikheli nembobo yeseva ye-SSH uxhumano oluzodluliswa kuyo. Ngokuvamile i-SSH ilalela kumbhobo 22. (b) Igama Lomsebenzisi/Iphasiwedi: Igama lomsebenzisi nephasiwedi ye-akhawunti kuseva ye-SSH. Iphasiwedi izogcwaliswa kuleli khasi uma ungakayeki uhlelo zokusebenza kusukela ekugcineni uyifakile. (c) Phatha Ukhiye/Sebenzisa Ukhiye: Inkinobho yokuphatha okhiye bomphakathi/bangasese, nebhokisi lokuhlola elibonisa ukuthi kusebenziswe ukhiye kunokusetshenziswa kwephasiwedi ukuqinisekisa. Uma usebenzisa inkinobho yokukopishela ku-Clipboard ngemuva kokukhiqiza ipheya lokhiye, kumele ukwazi ukunamathisela ukhiye womphakathi uma usuxhunyiwe kuseva ye-RDP (i-clipboard ivumelaniswe neseva).
- Izilungiselelo Zoxhumano Lwe-RDP: (a) Iseva ye-RDP/Imbobo: Yilapha lapho ufaka khona igama lomsingathi noma ikheli le-IP nembobo yekhompyutha esebenzisa iseva ye-RDP ofuna ukuyithinta. Kwimodi ye-RDP nge-SSH, leli kheli libonakala kusuka kuziseva ye-SSH. Uma iseva ye-SSH neseva ye-RDP kuyikhompyutha efanayo ngokomzimba, ungasebenzisa localhost. Iziseva ze-RDP zivame ukulalela kumbhobo 3389. (b) Umsebenzisi we-RDP: Yilapha lapho ufaka khona igama lakho lomsebenzisi le-akhawunti ye-Windows/UNIX. (c) Isizinda se-RDP: Faka isizinda i-akhawunti yakho engaphansi kwaso. (d) Iphasiwedi ye-RDP: Yilapha lapho ufaka khona iphasiwedi ye-akhawunti yakho ye-Windows/UNIX. Isitoreji esiphephile asisetshenziswa kumaphasiwedi (akusedathabheyisi), futhi iphasiwedi izolondolozwa kuphela uma uhlola ibhokisi elithi \"Gcina\". Iphasiwedi izogcwaliswa kuleli khasi uma ungakayeki uhlelo zokusebenza kusukela ekugcineni uyifakile.
- Izilungiselelo ezithuthukile: Kulesi sigaba uzothola izindlela zokwenza usandiso lwedeskithophu ngokwezifiso, nokuthutha ukusebenza kwe-RDP okuhlukahlukene
- Ukulungiselela Kwedivayisi Yendawo: Lokhu kulungisa ukuziphatha kohlelo zokusebenza kudivayisi yakho. (a) Sebenzisa D-Pad yemicibisholo: Uma ukhetha, ungasebenzisa i-D-Pad yekhibhodi yakho ye-Bluetooth noma imicibisholo yekhibhodi yakho yesikrini ukuthumela imicibisholo kuseva ye-RDP. (b) Phendula D-Pad: Izingcingo eziphahlene nekhibhodi ye-Bluetooth zingase zidinge ukuthi i-D-pad yekhibhodi iphendulwe ngokuphambana newashi ukuthumela iziqondiso ezilungile kuseva. (c) Isikhombisi segundane sendawo: Uma isikhombisi singabonakali, khetha lokhu ukuphoqa ukuthi sidwetshwe uhlelo zokusebenza."
Iseva ye-RDP noma imbobo ayinalutho. Ayikwazi ukuxhuma!

OKUBALULEKILE: Uma usebenzisa i-UltraVNC repeater, faka ikheli layo nembobo ngaphandle kwale ngxoxo. Lapha, faka ikheli nembobo yeseva ye-VNC yangempela. Hlukanisa ikheli leseva ye-VNC nembobo ngokucolon, isib. 192.168.0.100:5900.
Khetha imodi yesandla esisodwa noma ukhansele
Imodi yokudonsela kwesokunxele - swayipha ukudonsa/ukukhetha, phakamisa umnwe ukumisa
Imodi yokudonsela phakathi - swayipha ukudonsa/ukukhetha, phakamisa umnwe ukumisa
Isikhombisi segundane sibekwe kabusha kwimodi yesandla esisodwa
Imodi yokudonsela kwesokudla - swayipha ukudonsa/ukukhetha, phakamisa umnwe ukumisa
Imodi yokuskrola - swayipha phezulu/phansi ukuskrola, phakamisa umnwe ukumisa
Imodi yokusondeza - swayipha phezulu/phansi ukusondeza/ukususa, phakamisa umnwe ukumisa
Iphutha lokufunda ifayela le-CA. Sicela uqiniseke ukuthi liyafundeka.
Ifayela alitholakalanga. Sicela ufake igama lefayela elivumelekile enkundleni yombhalo (isib. /sdcard/ca-cert.pem).

Siyabonga ngokusekelwa kwe-aSPICE kanye nesofthiwe ye-open-source ngokujwayelekile! Ukuthola usizo ngokusebenzisa i-aSPICE, bona izinto Zosizo kuMenyu, nencazelo yohlelo zokusebenza emakethe.

Uhlu lwamanje lwezici ze-aSPICE lufaka:
- SPICE Evamile, SPICE edluliswe ngethunneli ye-SSH.
- Ukusekelwa kokuphendula ngokukhululeka. Sebenzisa Uhlelo Lokusebenza ukunciphisa ukuphendula uma kudingeka.
- Ukukhiqizwa nokuthunywa kokhiye womphakathi/wangasese we-SSH.
- Ukulondolozwa Kwe-Session Okuzenzakalelayo.
- Izimodi zokuskala Ezisondezekayo, Lingana Nesikrini, ne-Eyodwa Ku-Eyodwa.
- Ukulawulwa kwegundane elekude ngokuthinta okuningi kwizimodi zokufaka Ngqo ne-Touchpad Efaniswe.
- Ukulawulwa okuphelele kwegundane elekude ngesandla esisodwa kwimodi yokufaka Ngesandla Esisodwa.
- Ukukhilikitha kwegundane ngokuthinta okuningi: chofoza ukukhilikitha Kwesokunxele, ukuchofoza ngeminwe emibili ukukhilikitha kwesokudla, ukuchofoza ngeminwe emithathu ukukhilikitha phakathi.
- Ukuskrola ngokuthinta okuningi: ukudonsa ngeminwe emibili Phezulu/Phansi, nangakwesokunxele/kwesokudla ukuskrola.
- Okhiye be-meta nemicibisholo yesikrini abangakhutshazwa ngokuphelele kumenyu noma bagcinwe ngenkinobho yesikrini.
- Ukuthumela Umbhalo nezinhlanganisela zokhiye ezingavumelekile lapho kuxhunyiwe.
- Usizo lokwakha uxhumano (\"Imenyu->Usizo Loxhumano\") esikrinini soxhumano.
- Usizo lwezimodi zokufaka (\"Imenyu->Okuningi->Usizo Lwemodi Yokufaka\") lapho kuxhunyiwe.
- Ukusebenzisa i-trackpad etholakalayo njengeMicibisholo esikhundleni sokuhambisa igundane, nokuchofoza kwetrekhphedi njenge-Ctrl, ukuphendula i-D-Pad/i-trackpad yamakhibhodi e-BT.
- Ukusekelwa kwezilimi eziningi, uma nje iseva ye-SPICE inendlela yolimi edingekayo evuliwe.
- Ukushintshwa kosandiso lwedeskithophu ekude ngaphandle kwenkinga
- Ukusekelwa okuphelele kwegundane kumadivayisi e-Android 4.0+, kufaka phakathi ukukhilikitha kwesokudla nokuphakathi nesondo lokuskrola.

Izici ezihlelelwe:
- Ukuhlanganiswa Kwekopishi/Kunamathisele
- Umsindo
- Ukuthuthukiswa kokusebenza
Izinkinga ezaziwayo:
- Ukuthumela umbhalo akuthumeli amanye amasimboli.

" Uma ungeza noma uhlela uxhumano, uzobona ikhasi lokulungiselelwa koxhumano. Lapha ungalungiselela uxhumano olusha lwe-SPICE, noma ukhethe oluvele lukhona. Phezulu kukhona inkinobho ekuvumela ukuthi ulondoloze uxhumano. Ngezansi kungalapho ulungisa khona uxhumano lwakho.
- Uhlobo Loxhumano: Lapha ukhetha uhlobo loxhumano lwe-SPICE. Izinhlobo zoxhumano ezitholakalayo yilezi: (a) SPICE, exhuma ngqo kukhompyutha nge-protocol ye-SPICE. (b) SPICE nge-SSH, eqala ngokudonsa uxhumano lwakho ngekhompyutha esebenzisa iseva ye-SSH.
- Isihloko: Uxhumano ngalunye olwakhayo lungaba nesiteketiso sokulubona kalula ohlwini.
- Izilungiselelo Zethunneli ye-SSH: Zitholakala kwimodi ye-SPICE nge-SSH. (a) Iseva ye-SSH/Imbobo: Ikheli nembobo yeseva ye-SSH uxhumano oluzodluliswa kuyo. Ngokuvamile i-SSH ilalela kumbhobo 22. (b) Igama Lomsebenzisi/Iphasiwedi: Igama lomsebenzisi nephasiwedi ye-akhawunti kuseva ye-SSH. Iphasiwedi izogcwaliswa kuleli khasi uma ungakayeki uhlelo zokusebenza kusukela ekugcineni uyifakile. (c) Phatha Ukhiye/Sebenzisa Ukhiye: Inkinobho yokuphatha okhiye bomphakathi/bangasese, nebhokisi lokuhlola elibonisa ukuthi kusebenziswe ukhiye kunokusetshenziswa kwephasiwedi ukuqinisekisa. Uma usebenzisa inkinobho yokukopishela ku-Clipboard ngemuva kokukhiqiza ipheya lokhiye, kumele ukwazi ukunamathisela ukhiye womphakathi uma usuxhunyiwe kuseva ye-SPICE (i-clipboard ivumelaniswe neseva).
- Izilungiselelo Zoxhumano Lwe-SPICE: (a) Iseva ye-SPICE/Imbobo: Yilapha lapho ufaka khona igama lomsingathi noma ikheli le-IP nembobo yekhompyutha esebenzisa iseva ye-SPICE ofuna ukuyithinta. Kwimodi ye-SPICE nge-SSH, leli kheli libonakala kusuka kuziseva ye-SSH. Uma iseva ye-SSH neseva ye-SPICE kuyikhompyutha efanayo ngokomzimba, ungasebenzisa localhost. Iziseva ze-SPICE zivame ukulalela kumbhobo 5900 nangaphezulu. (d) Iphasiwedi ye-SPICE: Yilapha lapho ufaka khona iphasiwedi esetelwe ukuvikela i-session yakho ye-SPICE. Isitoreji esiphephile asisetshenziswa kumaphasiwedi (akusedathabheyisi), futhi iphasiwedi izolondolozwa kuphela uma uhlola ibhokisi elithi \"Gcina\". Iphasiwedi izogcwaliswa kuleli khasi uma ungakayeki uhlelo zokusebenza kusukela ekugcineni uyifakile.
- Izilungiselelo ezithuthukile: Kulesi sigaba uzothola izilungiselelo zedivayisi yendawo noma ukuthutha ukusebenza kwe-SPICE - Ukulungiselela Kwedivayisi Yendawo: Lokhu kulungisa ukuziphatha kohlelo zokusebenza kudivayisi yakho. (a) Sebenzisa D-Pad yemicibisholo: Uma ukhetha, ungasebenzisa i-D-Pad yekhibhodi yakho ye-Bluetooth noma imicibisholo yekhibhodi yakho yesikrini ukuthumela imicibisholo kuseva ye-SPICE. (b) Phendula D-Pad: Izingcingo eziphahlene nekhibhodi ye-Bluetooth zingase zidinge ukuthi i-D-pad yekhibhodi iphendulwe ngokuphambana newashi ukuthumela iziqondiso ezilungile kuseva. (c) Isikhombisi segundane sendawo: Uma isikhombisi singabonakali, khetha lokhu ukuphoqa ukuthi sidwetshwe uhlelo zokusebenza."
Iseva ye-SPICE noma imbobo ayinalutho. Ayikwazi ukuxhuma!
Sicela ufake Ikhodi Yokuqinisekisa yokungena okuningi
Iseva ye-VNC noma imbobo ayinalutho. Ayikwazi ukuxhuma!
Iseva ye-VNC noma imbobo ayinalutho. Ayikwazi ukulondoloza uxhumano!

ISEXWAYISO: Isitifiketi se-x509 esilondoloziwe noma isiginesha edluliselwe ayifani nesitifiketi samanje seseva! Lokhu kungaba ukuhlasela kwe-man-in-the-middle. Uma wazi ngokushintshwa kokhiye ungaqhubeka.
I-Logcat ikopishelwe ku-clipboard. Usungayinamathisela ku-imeyili noma esikhundleni sosizo. Sicela ubheke noma yidiphu yomuntu siqu ngaphambi kokushicilela.

Iseva ibika ukuthi ayisekeli Ukufakwa Kwegundane Kwemodi Yeqalabulzo, futhi imodi yamanje yokufaka igundane ngeke isebenze ngendlela efanele. Uma lokhu kuqhubeka, qiniseka ukuthi i-spice tools ifakiwe kushini obonakalayo noma ushintshe kuModi Yokufaka ye-Touchpad Efaniswe kusuka kuMenyu.
Faka igama lesihloko sesitifiketi lapha. Kungase kungadingeki uma igama elifanayo lesitifiketi (CN) lihambisana negama lomsingathi weseva.
Faka indlela yefayela (isibonelo /sdcard/ca-cert.pem) bese uchofoza Ngenisa ukulayisha Isikhulu Sesitifiketi sakho.
Faka Isikhulu Sesitifiketi lapha uma ungasingenisi njengefayela.
Ukhiye omusha ukhiqizwe noma ungeniswe ngempumelelo. Usungachofoza inkinobho ethi \'Khiqiza/Thumela Ukhiye\' ukuze wabelane, ukopishele ku-clipboard, noma uthumele ukhiye womphakathi.
Iseva yakho idinga ukuqinisekisa ngephasiwedi ngaphezu kokuqinisekisa ngokhiye.

" Uma uhlelo zokusebenza luqalisiwe lubonisa isikrini esinesixhumano esilondoloziwe kuso.
Uma kungekho uxhumano olulondoloziwe, ingxenye engezansi yesikrini ayinalutho, futhi kuzodingeka uchofoza inkinobho ye-plus ukwakha olusha. Ungaphinda ulawule ezinye izingxenye zokulungiselelwa ukusuka kulesi sikrini ngokuchofoza ezinye izinketho zebha yamathuluzi noma zemenyu phezulu, isibonelo ukuhlela izilungiselelo ezivamile, noma ukungenisa nokuthumela izilungiselelo.
Uma usunoxhumano olulondoloziwe, ungaxhuma kuseva ekude ngokulichofoza kanye. Uzophinda ube nokuzikhethela ukususa noma uluhlele ngokulichofoza isikhathi eside.
Ekugcineni, ungasebenzisa inkundla yokuseshelwa Ukuxhumano ukuthola ngokushesha uxhumano ngokuhlunga uxhumano olubonisiwe."

" Uma ungeza noma uhlela uxhumano, uzobona ikhasi lokulungiselelwa koxhumano. Lapha ungalungiselela uxhumano olusha lwe-Opaque noma ukhethe oluvele lukhona. Phezulu kukhona inkinobho ekuvumela ukuthi ulondoloze uxhumano. Ngezansi kungalapho ulungisa khona uxhumano lwakho.
- Uhlobo Loxhumano: Lapha ukhetha ukuthi uxhuma kumvelo yokuzenzela ethini.
- Ikheli Leseva: Igama lomsingathi noma i-IP yeseva. Uma ilalele kumbhobo ongavamile, ungangeza imbobo ehlukaniswe ngokucolon.
- Igama lomshini obonakalayo: Ungabeka igama le-VM njengoba libonakala kuphlatifomi yakho Yokuzenzela noma uyishiye ingenalutho le nkundla ukuthola uhlu lwe-VM noma iziqukathi ozozikhethela kuzo.
- Umsebenzisi: Faka igama lomsebenzisi ukuqinisekisa kuhlaka lakho lokuzenzela.
- Iphasiwedi: Uma ungathanda ukulondoloza iphasiwedi, yifake lapha noma uyishiye le nkundla ingenalutho ukubuzwa ngezikhathi zonke.
- Izilungiselelo ezithuthukile: Kulesi sigaba uzothola noma yiziphi izilungiselelo zedivayisi yendawo, ze-protocol, nokuthutha ukusebenza."
Kungase kudingeke ukuthi unikeze izimvume kuhlelo zokusebenza ngezilungiselelo.
Yabelana ngexhumaniso lohlelo zokusebenza nabangane bakho bonke kumanetiwekhi abantu!
Lolu xhumano lusetelwe ukuqalisa i-VPN ngohlelo zokusebenza lwangaphandle. Udinga ukufaka uhlelo zokusebenza olufana ne-Morpheusly ukuluqalisa.
